content: प्रचुद् {c10c} <ab>U.</ab> {@--1@} To impel, prompt, urge, incite; चापलाय प्रचोदितः <ls>R. 1. 9.</ls> {@--2@} To drive or urge on, push on. {@--3@} To excite, inspire, encourage, incite, stimulate. {@--4@} To enjoin, direct, prescribe. {@--5@} To request, ask. {@--6@} To fix, settle, determine. {@--7@} To proclaim, announce.
